snippet: The Spanish police raided the headquarters of the Convergence party and arrested a dozen people in an investigation into whether companies paid bribes for public works contracts.
abstract: Andreu Viloca, treasurer of Catalonia's governing party, which has been agitating for region to secede from Spain, is arrested along with others in police raid tied to bribery investigation.
lead_paragraph: The Spanish police raided the headquarters of the Convergence party and arrested a dozen people in an investigation into whether companies paid bribes for public works contracts.

headline.print_headline: World Briefing | Europe; Spain: Official of Catalan Party Arrested
headline.main: Spanish Police Arrest Treasurer of Catalan Governing Party
